description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) located in Edmonton, Alberta has a requirement for the supply and delivery of Remotely Piloted Aircraft Systems (RPAS) as per the specifications and quantities identified in Annex A.

full_summary:
# Remote Piloted Aircraft System (Drones) -  Request for Proposal
we are seeking a supplier to provide Remotely Piloted Aircraft System (RPAS) in accordance with Canadian Aviation Regulations Part IX.

## Supplies and Deliveries
The supplier must deliver the Remotely Piloted Aircraft System (RPAS) within 15 days of contract award.

## Indigenous Business Set-Aside
This procurement has been conditionally set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). To be considered, the supplier must certify that it qualifies as an Indigenous business and comply with all requirements of PSIB.

## Contact and Tendering Information
Supplier must submit their bid to the RCMP's bid receiving unit:
`<nwr_procurement_bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca>` Website:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/?qs=PYD6BIQSjB8fWXpEWlihoHUKE02dw9vkcvOwDJ9LfC0FcaeWnBrNWIoPoiZuRHZSz4RZhEXO99DWaXw--

## Attachment and Documentation
Additional documentation is available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website including RPAS specification and quantity details.

**Conditions**
Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Procuration and Contract Details**

* Title: Remote Piloted Aircraft System (Drones)
* Contract Award Date: 2024-05-01
* End Date: 2025-05-01

**Contracting Agency**
The contracting agency is the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) located in Edmonton, Alberta. The contract award will be made to the lowest evaluated bid that meets all mandatory technical specifications and evaluation criteria.

**Purpose of Service**
The intended use of the Remotely Piloted Aircraft System (RPAS) is for support to enforcement operations in accordance with Canadian law enforcement, and other related law enforcement requirements.

To find out additional information and view the attached solicitation documents, we invite you to log in to the GETS website.

**Definitions**
* A remotely piloted aircraft is an uncontrollable unmanned vehicle.
* An indigenous business is an organization located within the iga’s business location is geographically located, a certified indigious docus restrict,
